title: Glasses For Good
description: My team and I, partnering with Vanderbilt Health, strive to help patients with syndromes which produce facial abnormalities by making a custom glasses generation tool for Vanderbilt Health.
author: Liam Loeffel

title: Immigrid
description: This project was intended to be used as a tool for new Immigrants in the United States to help them feel less culturally isolated and find groups of people they would be able to connect with culturally, and assist in obtaining important legal documentation
author: Liam Loeffel
